mutants.code:
def max_intersections(lines, N):
    l1 = []
    l2 = []
    for p in lines:
        l1.append(p[0])
        l2.append(p[1])
    l1.sort()
    l2.sort()
    i = 1
    j = 0
    ans = 0
    k = 0
    while i < N and j < N:
        if l1[i] <= l2[j]:
            k += 1
            ans = max(ans, k)
            i += 1
        else:
            k -= 1
            j += 1
    return ans

        l2.append(p[0])
    l1.sort()
    l2.sort()
    i = 0
    j = 0
    ans = 0
    k = 0
    while i < N and j < N:
        if l1[i] <= l2[j]:
            k += 1
            ans = max(ans, k)
            i += 1
        else:
            k -= 1
            j += 1
    return ans

def max_intersections(lines, N):
    l1 = []
    l2 = []
    for p in lines:
        l1.append(p[0])
        l2.append(p[0])
    l1.sort()
    l2.sort()
    i = 0
    j = 0
    ans = 0
    k = 0
    while i < N and j < N:
        if l1[i] <= l2[j]:
            k += 1
            ans = max(ans, k)
            i += 1
        else:
            k -= 1
            j += 1
    return ans

def max_intersections(lines, N):
    l1 = []
    l2 = []
    for p in lines:
        l1.append(p[0])
        l2.append(p[-1])
    l1.sort()
    l2.sort()
    i = 0
    j = 0
    ans = 0
    k = 0
    while i < N and j < N:
        if l1[i] <= l2[j]:
            k += 1
            ans = max(ans, k)
            i += 1
        else:
            k -= 1
            j += 1
    return ans
